message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Fair is fair.
I think I deserve a bit more, don't you?
Okay, I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I'm not going to let you take advantage of inflation. This is my final offer.
Inflation is on my side, I'll take a bit more
I'm willing to concede a bit more to avoid further losses from inflation, but this is it. If you reject this, we'll both be worse off.
